name: Father Code Token
description: Father Code Token (FCD) is the utility token of the premium lifestyle brand Father Code. It provides access to exclusive discounts, NFTs, limited product drops, and the brand’s legendary 'Treasure Hunt' — a multi-layered quest encrypted across music videos, packaging, and secret QR codes. Viral TikTok content and song lyrics serve as hidden clues. Holders of FCD unlock parts of a mystery that may lead to a gold bar, a legendary belt, or a share in the brand itself. FCD is not just a token — it's a key to prosperity and a story destined to become a legend for decades.
